mapper.select: SELECT a.*,a.member_id as 'member.id',b.name as 'member.name',b.avatar as 'member.avatar',c.name as 'member.memberLevel.name' FROM tbl_checkin as a left join tbl_member as b on a.member_id = b.id left join tbl_member_level as c on b.member_level_id = c.id where DATEDIFF(a.create_time,now())=0 ORDER BY a.id DESC

SELECT a.*,a.member_id as 'member.id',b.name as 'member.name',b.avatar as 'member.avatar',c.name as 'member.memberLevel.name' FROM tbl_checkin as a left join tbl_member as b on a.member_id = b.id left join tbl_member_level as c on b.member_level_id = c.id where DATEDIFF(a.create_time,now())=0 ORDER BY a.continue_day DESC limit 0,20

SELECT a.*,a.member_id as 'member.id',b.name as 'member.name',b.avatar as 'member.avatar',c.name as 'member.memberLevel.name' FROM tbl_checkin as a left join tbl_member as b on a.member_id = b.id left join tbl_member_level as c on b.member_level_id = c.id where a.member_id = #{memberId} and DATEDIFF(a.create_time,now())=0

SELECT a.*,a.member_id as 'member.id',b.name as 'member.name',b.avatar as 'member.avatar',c.name as 'member.memberLevel.name' from tbl_checkin as a left join tbl_member as b on a.member_id = b.id left join tbl_member_level as c on b.member_level_id = c.id where a.member_id = #{memberId} and DATEDIFF(a.create_time,now())=-1
